title: Font
content:
I need to try and find out which font is used on the slogan on the following logo. Its the slogan tagged under the main text and read ’Making life better for students at Bucks’

The logo is attached!

Ta, Si

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110627im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/BUCKS_Logo_6161.jpg)

 [‹ Citroen: 1970s Akzidenz/Geometric Hybrid](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110627/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42979 "Go to previous forum topic") [Amerigroup? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110627/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43005 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simonmc

comments.content: This all looks like from the freewaredepartment. And yes it’s [Walkway](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828110627/http:/www.dafont.com/walkway.font?nb_ppp=50&af=on&text=Making+life+better+students) by Gemfonts.

Cheers Renko - your a star!

Si
